title: El Chapo
lyrics:
Yo yo
El-el Gringo, El Gringo, El Chapo, El Chapo (El Chapo)
Boy violate and the chopper dem chop you
Unruly fucking boss
Me ova dweet
Put the 'K pon repeat

Bullet inna face, anuh feet

Lef' shell pon the street

Make bare squady see it

Boy gone with the worm fi go sleep (woii)

Empty di MAK 90 inna your face and gone

So real badman kill dem

Police come find dem dead pon the street like dog

M1 rifle ah sting dem (ah sting dem)

Bare one stepper boy gi' you one (gi' you one)

Pussy, man ah bad from day one (day one)

Buss out dem head, me no spare man

When mi rifle a spray like Baygon, dawg

Gunshot connect like three way

Slap out dem head pon the freeway

Boy body drop inna middle day

When Grabba Dawg squeeze up the mini 'K

Pussy dem tink dem evil yet

Empty the Intratec inna your pee pee breath

Killy 'tep up inna dem place

Bullet inna dem face

When dem ah watch stage show pon 'he Internet

Mmh, watch the boy neat, and send him home

Down ah Madden, pon the ice him chilling out

Coffin and wreath dem picking out

You love chat, gunshot never miss your mouth

Him friend dem a yap a lot

True dem ah lack a Glock

Wah dem ah do?

If the pussy dem bad, tell dem, "Run in!"

A gunshot ah bun him, yeah

El Chapo, El Chapo, El Chapo, dawg

Killy Killy, Killy Killy

El Chapo, El Chapo, El Chapo, dawg

Killy Killy, Killy Killy

Evil head, evil head

Evil medz, evil medz (oh)

Evil head, evil head

Man ah real Killy Killy, Killy Killy, mmh

El Chapo, El Chapo, El Chapo, dawg

Killy Killy, Killy Killy

El Chapo, El Chapo, El Chapo, dawg

Killy Killy, Killy Killy

Evil head, evil head, woii

Evil medz, evil medz, woii

Evil head, evil head, woii

Killy Killy, Killy Killy

Pull up pon dem endz inna the Honda Stream

White line just ah beat up the laser beam

With the M16, it's ah page me gi' him

Buss him head inna di traffic, everybody ah see him

Double tap, fully auto grains ah beat off

No pussy can't call Unruly weak heart

Shot ah knock inna your chest, no shoot no knee part

If you don't mean it, nuh mek no cheap talk (woii)

3 West, Braeton, Naggos Head

Killy dem no 'fraid fi lef' a clip inna dem dread

Thirty inna clip, and me got one inna the head

And anytime me buck dem up, a ten inna dem head (inna dem head)

Big MAK 90 me lift up

Pussy dem see the fire ball and shit up

Boy ah run fi him life and trip up

Iron dog bark, volcano ah erupt (oh)

El Chapo, El Chapo, El Chapo, dawg

Killy Killy, Killy Killy

El Chapo, El Chapo, El Chapo, dawg

Killy Killy, Killy Killy

Evil head, evil head

Evil medz, evil medz (oh)

Evil head, evil head

Man ah real Killy Killy, Killy Killy (oh)

El Chapo, El Chapo, El Chapo, dawg

Killy Killy, Killy Killy

El Chapo, El Chapo, El Chapo, dawg

Killy Killy, Killy Killy

Evil head, evil head, woii

Evil medz, evil medz, woii

Evil head, evil head, woii

Killy Killy, Killy Killy

El Chapo, El Chapo, El Chapo, dawg

Killy Killy, Killy Killy

El Chapo, El Chapo, El Chapo, dawg
